parameterdescription.para: Pointer to buffer to hold the built temperature measurement characteristic.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Health Thermometer profile sensor.

parameterdescription.para: WSF handler ID of the application using this service.

briefdescription.para: Start periodic temperature measurement. This function starts a timer to perform periodic measurements.

parameterdescription.para: WSF event designated by the application for the timer.
Index of intermediate temperature CCC descriptor in CCC descriptor handle table.
Index of temperature measurement CCC descriptor in CCC descriptor handle table.

briefdescription.para: This function is called by the application when the periodic measurement timer expires.
